data.text: @chrisvanderveen There are several rural counties in CO that have rising case rates. Can you find out which variant is prevalent in@that rise and ask CDPHE why it’s occurring?
@chrisvanderveen Imagine if we instituted mask mandates at the first sign of increase, but sadly most people don’t care if others get sick or die and of course it never is going to happen to them.
@chrisvanderveen Here’s a question: the UK cases didn’t drop as far down as ours have. Does that make a difference?
@chrisvanderveen Thank you!! I appreciate all of the info you provide!!
@chrisvanderveen Yes but last March a lot of the population wasn’t eligible for vaccination
@chrisvanderveen Thank you, Chris. You've been, and continue to be, my go-to source for rational reporting on COVID.
@chrisvanderveen This is really good news today!! Thanks for keeping us informed about this, Chris!! I am a huge fan of you, and your accurate reporting!! 🥰🎙👏🎙👏🥰
